en.title: FusionExcel Headquarter Opening Ceremony 8.08 PM 08.08.08 (1)
en.content:
What an auspicious start! FE's new Headquarter at Lots 8230-8231, Jalan 222A Section 51A, Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia was officially opened with fireworks at 08 minutes past 08 pm on the 08th month of 2008 to coincide with the opening ceremony of the 2008 Beijing Olympics!  The timing was perfect and will always be remembered for years to come!

FE's new 18,000 square feet Headquarter comes with an impressive lobby with fountains and water features, a big and functional sales area, a big members lounge,a big seminar room, meeting rooms, large admin areas upstairs and warehouse and storage facilities.

There were 500 invited guests for the ceremony and ribbon cutting, including 80 VIPs from overseas. Everybody had a great time being entertained by a 3 piece Jazz Band and live telecast of the 2008 Beijing Olympics Opening Ceremony with free flow of sumptuous food and drinks! Father of Thai Jazz Metawat Sapsanyakorn also entertain the crowd with his famous jazz music. Also at the event FE is proud to announce the sponsorship of a telemovie "The Legacy of A Lost Love" with film producer and actor James Wong Chee Keong. FE's Quantum Pendant will be written into the storyline and featured prominently in the movie.  It was a night to be remembered!

Amongst The  VIPs and Celebrities, local and Overseas, Gracing FE's Opening Ceremony Are:
Mrs Pattana Chuensiri (Thai Lion Club President), Rit Louecha (Thai Superstar), Aswin Banrungkit
(Thai  Superstar), Major Gen Khattiya "Sae-Dang", Don Chan (FE Thai Country Licensee), Surabadin Sombatchareon (Famous Thai DJ, Actor and Singer), Metawat Sapsanyakorn (Father of Thai Jazz), Prof Dr Vichit (FE Thai Medical Cosultant), Surachai Sombatcharoen(Famous Thai Country Singer), Sanphon Amatavanich (President Thai Rotary Club), Prof Dr Police General Darun Sotthbandhu PHD , Sombati Medhanee (Thai Superstar) , Pol Major General Angkul, Mrs Pitchuda Plaivech (Thai Lion Club President), Manuel Monsour (FE's Filipino Spokesman and  well known Movie Star), Judge Lorenzo (President Lighthouse Centre and Charter President Rotary Club Quezon City Nth, Philippines), James Wong Chee Keong (Well known Malaysian Actor & Presenter), Frederick Lee Meng Chong (Actor and Model), Novel Lim Siew Theng (Former Miss  Astro Chinese International 2006), Aenie Wong Sook Kuang (Former Miss Malaysia Asia Pacific).

FE would like to take this opportunity to thank all our Leaders for this VERY SUCCESSFUL EVENT!
HIP HIP HOORAY !!
